name: mhub
description: Simple, flexible message hub using websockets

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run mocha
scripts.build:src: cd src && tsc && dts-generator --name mhub --baseDir . --out ../dist/mhub.d.ts --main mhub/index index.ts
scripts.build: npm run build:src && npm run build:test
scripts.watch:start: mkdir -p dist/src/ && touch dist/src/server.js && nodemon --delay 1 --watch dist/src/
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run watch:src' 'npm run watch:test' 'npm run watch:start'
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test

author: Martin Poelstra <martin@beryllium.net>
